thread.section_title: Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great welcome and excellent service
thread.title_full: Great welcome and excellent service - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: James J
title: Great welcome and excellent service
text: The staff should really be congratulated here, going above and beyond to put things right and make your stay a great experience. Friendly, welcoming and great value for money. Food has much improved and the rooms are some of the most comfortable in the chain.
